org.finra.datagenerator.engine.scxml

Class SCXMLEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.scxml.SCXMLExecutor
      • org.finra.datagenerator.engine.scxml.SCXMLEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Engine

    public class SCXMLEngine
extends org.apache.commons.scxml.SCXMLExecutor
implements Engine
    Engine implementation for generating data with SCXML state machine models.

    Marshall Peters Date: 8/25/14

    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • bfs

        public List<PossibleState> bfs(int min)
                        throws org.apache.commons.scxml.model.ModelException
        Performs a partial BFS on model until the search frontier reaches the desired bootstrap size
        Parameters:
        min - the desired bootstrap size
        Returns:
        a list of found PossibleState
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.scxml.model.ModelException - if the desired bootstrap can not be reached
